meanings.definition: An exercise in which a person lies flat on their back, lifts their torso to a sitting position, and then lies back down again.
meanings.sent1: After my daily situps, my stomach muscles feel stronger.
meanings.sent2: She does situps every morning to stay fit.
meanings.sent3: I tried doing situps with my eyes closed, and I almost fell off the mat!
meanings.sent4: His determination to improve his health was as steady as a routine of situps.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic motion of situps can be quite meditative.
